name: Suki Desu Kakarichou!
nutshell:
Kariya panics when his perfect 10 co-worker Shishido professes his love for him!! And to make things worse, Kariya tempts him in drunken haze!?
Be entranced by all 7 stories including 'TSUKIYAMA'S DIARY', the story of a young genius novelist, the older editor he seduces, and all the heartache involved!

name: Wild Arms 3 - An Adventure in Sepia (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Several different stories by several different authors. The quirks of Wild ARMs 3 are outlined in… uh, odd ways.

name: Snow White '94
nutshell: A headstrong Snow White lives with her dwarfs; including one who may or may not have feelings for her…

name: Mebuki Kimidori
nutshell: From Ouzoku Scans: Towa always had the gift of sensing danger. One day, she gets a bad premonition about a boy. She, along with her friend Ririko, tries hard to prevent it from happening. What will happen next?

name: Maou Sounanchu!!!
nutshell: The devil who lost its magical power in the fight against long angels fulfills the principle of absorbing the human soul and restoring its power! It was a demon king who traveled to the human world with a trusting four heavenly kings, but the destination that I reached was a solitary island of the ocean…! On that island where magic can not be used, a survival that can laugh backwards with the sadness of rulers and subordinates in the Makai begins!

name: Shinikaeri
nutshell: Miastem wstrząsnęła seria morderstw dokonanych przez osobliwego „Kosiarza Głów”. Plotka głosi, że tak naprawdę jest on samobójcą, który ożył w niejasnych okolicznościach. Kiedy los prowadzi do spotkania pewnego mężczyzny, przypadkiem wplątującego się w sprawę, z młodym detektywem ścigającym mordercę, prawda wychodzi na jaw.

name: Torikago Syndrome
nutshell: Ayase is an orphan who has been held by a mysterious man whom he has never seen. One day he transfers to an academy where there are no rules and where teachers cannot enter the students' dorms. Who is the real person who sets the rules within the academy?

name: 29-Ji no Asa Gohan ~Misoshiru-ya Asage~
nutshell: 眠らない街・歌舞伎町。その片隅に朝の5時に開店する小さな定食屋「あさげ」はある。切り盛りするのはうら若い姉妹、メニューは一品だけの一風変わったこの店には、夜の街のワケアリたちが毎朝ふらりと訪れて…。今日も小さなドラマが始まる！

name: Te wo Nobashitara, Tsubasa
nutshell:
"I want to have it. That was all."
Chikara is a university student working diligently on his research, in order to achieve his childhood dream. One night, he witnesses a secret on the back of the transfer student with perfect looks and intellect, Satomi ⁠— and his beauty sets Chikara's body on fire.
The two quickly grow closer, but there's a side of Satomi that Chikara doesn't know about...!?
This is a story of the darkness behind Satomi, hope and rebirth.

name: I entered a girls' school with the recommendation of crossdressing.
nutshell: Airi Amamiya gets punished after losing the game to her sister. As punishment, she has to try to register for a famous girl's school with a crossdressing selection. They both thought they would be rejected, however. Airi was accepted, and Airi continued to do school activities with 3 other boys who are both crossdressers.

name: Punch ↑ + Jinan Joutou
nutshell: Kouta gets sick and Motoharu nurses him with loving care. Can it go well?

name: Eigyou no Makita desu.
nutshell: When Makita stopped for a minute and took a look at his life, he was already 28. Graduating from a great college and working hard in the sales department at Elvis Beer, a highly respected company, has brought him success but his life feels empty. Makita realizes he has been missing romance and, without it, he wasn’t truly living life. He actively starts looking at women from a new perspective but he doesn’t know what he really wants in a girlfriend.

name: Aslai - Please Don't Forget Me
tags: Long Strip,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
Eunja is a young woman who was inspired to become a social worker after her mother died of dementia
Her life as a social worker is fulfilling, but she has trouble with people who disrespect the elders
An inspiring tale of how Eunja's regrets about her mother's death fuel her to become a social worker

name: Hundred of Sleepless Nights
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: The secret love confession of a boy.

name: Mob Psycho 100 – BE MY MASTER (Doujinshi)
nutshell: While accustoming himself to working at Spirits & Such, Serizawa wishes to prove himself worthy of service by Reigen's side.

name: 24 Jikan Eigyouchuu - Chooser Lover (Doujinshi)
nutshell: When Sano has plans to go on an overseas trip for school, Nakamichi realizes just how much of a jealous boyfriend he actually is. Though Sano also just can't help but want to hear Nakamichi's voice.

name: Team Medical Dragon
nutshell:
Dr. Katou is an ambitious woman who seeks to revolutionize the corrupt and inefficient Japanese medical system from within by becoming a professor in a teaching hospital. She enlists a maverick surgeon, Dr. Asada Ryuutarou, to help her with research that would catapult her to a professorship should they succeed and publish. However, Asada's refusal to conform to the system soon threatens to destroy not only her plans but her entire career. Katou is prepared to do anything, including going along with the system, in order to achieve her end goal, but she begins to question whether she has gone too far as Asada's actions bring many of the system's shortcomings to light.


Won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2005

name: The Third: Aoi Hitomi no Shoujo
nutshell: Many years after a devastating war killed 80% of the population, Earth is being watched by a group of beings known as The Third, named for the third red eye on their forehead that can access various computer systems. Navigating this barren, apocalyptic landscape is Honoka, a jill-of-all-trades that uses her powerful third blue eye to detect life forces in battle as she attempts to keep her friends from The Third's deadly grasp.

name: My Majesty Wants to Ruin the Country
nutshell: She always thought she was just a parentless orphan, yet the mentor who took in her made her swear right in front of her that she would ruin a country to its demise? All of a sudden, this girl became the emperor of the country and there is 6 husband candidates (plaything) for her to choose?

name: Goryu Jin
nutshell: Is it wrong to love a monster? Follow her story to find the answer.

name: Matsukage ni Ikou
nutshell: The story of Yoshida Shouin, who acted as mentor for many of the Meiji Restoration's influential figures, including Itou Hirobumi.

name: Zettai Fukujuu Idol
nutshell: A love comedy about a female university student who is secretly working as an underground idol, and what happens when a super sadistic guy finds out.

name: Endless Rikon ~Moshimo Kekkon Seikatsu wo Yarinaosetanara~
nutshell: "Time keeps rewinding to one month before my divorce...!?" Will this hopeless husband, completely unaware of his crumbling family, realize his mistakes and escape from the time loop...!?

name: Doom Breaker
tags: Time Travel,Monsters,Action,Demons,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Adventure,Magic,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"
The final human, the greatest warrior on Earth, is defeated in his last stand against the Demon Lord, yet is given a second chance by the gods to go back ten years before the world's end.
"I'll pummel them all; the Demon Lord who took everything from me, and the gods who observed it all as entertainment!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost. But Zephyr's fate is not sealed -- the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive. Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

Webtoon PV
Original Webtoon: Naver Series, Naver Webtoon
Official Translations:

English
Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语
Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語

Spanish / Español
Thai / ภาษาไทย

name: Boku no Hero Academia - Solo nosotros dos viviendo juntos
nutshell:
Pareja: Todoroki Shoto x Midoriya Izuku
Traducción al inglés: "Oh My Gay! Scans"

name: Dad Asked Me to Choose One of Ten Goddesses to Marry
nutshell:
Dad asked me to choose one of ten goddesses to marry: As the leader of the “Dead Night” team with the most outstanding record in China’s Secret Army – “Dead Doctor” Feng Lin was asked by his father to choose one of the ten goddesses who had already engaged in marriage.
Feng Lin, who had no intention of doing so, had to come one by one to break off the marriage.
During the process, Liu Nian, the traitor of “Dead Night”, appeared. In order to get revenge…

name: Nightwatch Guardian
nutshell:
"Tell me, the pain and suffering I've went through… is there an easier way to endure it?"
The tiger, Li Yexun, didn't know how to comfort A'Song.
"There isn't… but you still have me."

name: Heavenly Sword's Grand Saga
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Action,Long Strip,Comedy,Martial Arts,Adventure,Fantasy,Web Comic,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
There are people in the world that thinks they are the ‘chosen’ of the heavens.
It’s been decades since chaos and strife among heroes ensued because of those people.
A certain disciple who has six masters has been entrusted with the fate of the central plains.
“If you guys are the heavens, then I’m the sword that’ll pierce the heavens.”
That was what he’d resolved to do… No one mentioned he was a fatty, though!
In any case, now that he’s here, he’ll need to save the… world… Damn it, lose some weight first.


Webtoon Trailer

name: The Legendary Master's Wife
nutshell:
After an explosion, You XiaoMo finds that he is now a probationary disciple of the TianXin sect. However, he is one with dubious potential, so just when he starts to adapt to his new circumstances, he receives a piece of bad news. If he is unable to produce the required result after half a year to become an official disciple of the TianXin sect, he would be driven out of the sect……
While You XiaoMo is going all out to earn money, he runs into Ling Xiao who is cloaked in human skin. To his horror, he later discovers that Ling Xiao is really someone cloaked in human skin……

name: Nakasareta!
nutshell: A small intense boy, Fei, suddenly appears in front of Masaki who just got dumped. But why does he lick her tears?

name: We On - Be the Shield
nutshell:
A girl transfers to a new school and soon monsters start to show up. Luckily for her, a group of boys from that school have superpowers.
The boys are based on the K-pop idol group, BTS.

name: No Guns Life
nutshell: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
